accepthandshake.name: AcceptHandshake
accepthandshake.description: Grants permission to send a response to the originator of a handshake agreeing to the action proposed by the handshake request

attachpolicy.name: AttachPolicy
attachpolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a policy to a root, an organizational unit, or an individual account

cancelhandshake.name: CancelHandshake
cancelhandshake.description: Grants permission to cancel a handshake

closeaccount.name: CloseAccount
closeaccount.description: Grants permission to close an AWS account that is now a part of an Organizations, either created within the organization, or invited to join the organization

createaccount.name: CreateAccount
createaccount.description: Grants permission to create an AWS account that is automatically a member of the organization with the credentials that made the request

creategovcloudaccount.name: CreateGovCloudAccount
creategovcloudaccount.description: Grants permission to create an AWS GovCloud (US) account

createorganization.name: CreateOrganization
createorganization.description: Grants permission to create an organization. The account with the credentials that calls the CreateOrganization operation automatically becomes the management account of the new organization

createorganizationalunit.name: CreateOrganizationalUnit
createorganizationalunit.description: Grants permission to create an organizational unit (OU) within a root or parent OU

createpolicy.name: CreatePolicy
createpolicy.description: Grants permission to create a policy that you can attach to a root, an organizational unit (OU), or an individual AWS account

declinehandshake.name: DeclineHandshake
declinehandshake.description: Grants permission to decline a handshake request. This sets the handshake state to DECLINED and effectively deactivates the request

deleteorganization.name: DeleteOrganization
deleteorganization.description: Grants permission to delete the organization

deleteorganizationalunit.name: DeleteOrganizationalUnit
deleteorganizationalunit.description: Grants permission to delete an organizational unit from a root or another OU

deletepolicy.name: DeletePolicy
deletepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a policy from your organization

deleteresourcepolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
deleteresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a resource policy from your organization

deregisterdelegatedadministrator.name: DeregisterDelegatedAdministrator
deregisterdelegatedadministrator.description: Grants permission to deregister the specified member AWS account as a delegated administrator for the AWS service that is specified by ServicePrincipal

describeaccount.name: DescribeAccount
describeaccount.description: Grants permission to retrieve Organizations-related details about the specified account

describecreateaccountstatus.name: DescribeCreateAccountStatus
describecreateaccountstatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current status of an asynchronous request to create an account

describeeffectivepolicy.name: DescribeEffectivePolicy
describeeffectivepolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the effective policy for an account

describehandshake.name: DescribeHandshake
describehandshake.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about a previously requested handshake

describeorganization.name: DescribeOrganization
describeorganization.description: Grants permission to retrieves details about the organization that the calling credentials belong to

describeorganizationalunit.name: DescribeOrganizationalUnit
describeorganizationalunit.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about an organizational unit (OU)

describepolicy.name: DescribePolicy
describepolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieves details about a policy

describeresourcepolicy.name: DescribeResourcePolicy
describeresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a resource policy

detachpolicy.name: DetachPolicy
detachpolicy.description: Grants permission to detach a policy from a target root, organizational unit, or account

disableawsserviceaccess.name: DisableAWSServiceAccess
disableawsserviceaccess.description: Grants permission to disable integration of an AWS service (the service that is specified by ServicePrincipal) with AWS Organizations

disablepolicytype.name: DisablePolicyType
disablepolicytype.description: Grants permission to disable an organization policy type in a root

enableawsserviceaccess.name: EnableAWSServiceAccess
enableawsserviceaccess.description: Grants permission to enable integration of an AWS service (the service that is specified by ServicePrincipal) with AWS Organizations

enableallfeatures.name: EnableAllFeatures
enableallfeatures.description: Grants permission to start the process to enable all features in an organization, upgrading it from supporting only Consolidated Billing features

enablepolicytype.name: EnablePolicyType
enablepolicytype.description: Grants permission to enable a policy type in a root

inviteaccounttoorganization.name: InviteAccountToOrganization
inviteaccounttoorganization.description: Grants permission to send an invitation to another AWS account, asking it to join your organization as a member account

leaveorganization.name: LeaveOrganization
leaveorganization.description: Grants permission to remove a member account from its parent organization

listawsserviceaccessfororganization.name: ListAWSServiceAccessForOrganization
listawsserviceaccessfororganization.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of the AWS services for which you enabled integration with your organization

listaccounts.name: ListAccounts
listaccounts.description: Grants permission to list all of the the accounts in the organization

listaccountsforparent.name: ListAccountsForParent
listaccountsforparent.description: Grants permission to list the accounts in an organization that are contained by a root or organizational unit (OU)

listchildren.name: ListChildren
listchildren.description: Grants permission to list all of the OUs or accounts that are contained in a parent OU or root

listcreateaccountstatus.name: ListCreateAccountStatus
listcreateaccountstatus.description: Grants permission to list the asynchronous account creation requests that are currently being tracked for the organization

listdelegatedadministrators.name: ListDelegatedAdministrators
listdelegatedadministrators.description: Grants permission to list the AWS accounts that are designated as delegated administrators in this organization

listdelegatedservicesforaccount.name: ListDelegatedServicesForAccount
listdelegatedservicesforaccount.description: Grants permission to list the AWS services for which the specified account is a delegated administrator in this organization

listhandshakesforaccount.name: ListHandshakesForAccount
listhandshakesforaccount.description: Grants permission to list all of the handshakes that are associated with an account

listhandshakesfororganization.name: ListHandshakesForOrganization
listhandshakesfororganization.description: Grants permission to list the handshakes that are associated with the organization

listorganizationalunitsforparent.name: ListOrganizationalUnitsForParent
listorganizationalunitsforparent.description: Grants permission to lists all of the organizational units (OUs) in a parent organizational unit or root

listparents.name: ListParents
listparents.description: Grants permission to list the root or organizational units (OUs) that serve as the immediate parent of a child OU or account

listpolicies.name: ListPolicies
listpolicies.description: Grants permission to list all of the policies in an organization

listpoliciesfortarget.name: ListPoliciesForTarget
listpoliciesfortarget.description: Grants permission to list all of the policies that are directly attached to a root, organizational unit (OU), or account

listroots.name: ListRoots
listroots.description: Grants permission to list all of the roots that are defined in the organization

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list all tags for the specified resource

listtargetsforpolicy.name: ListTargetsForPolicy
listtargetsforpolicy.description: Grants permission to list all the roots, OUs, and accounts to which a policy is attached

moveaccount.name: MoveAccount
moveaccount.description: Grants permission to move an account from its current root or OU to another parent root or OU

putresourcepolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
putresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to create or update a resource policy

registerdelegatedadministrator.name: RegisterDelegatedAdministrator
registerdelegatedadministrator.description: Grants permission to register the specified member account to administer the Organizations features of the AWS service that is specified by ServicePrincipal

removeaccountfromorganization.name: RemoveAccountFromOrganization
removeaccountfromorganization.description: Grants permission to removes the specified account from the organization

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to the specified resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from the specified resource

updateorganizationalunit.name: UpdateOrganizationalUnit
updateorganizationalunit.description: Grants permission to rename an organizational unit (OU)

updatepolicy.name: UpdatePolicy
updatepolicy.description: Grants permission to update an existing policy with a new name, description, or content
